entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
